SELECT A.SS_NO, (SELECT SS_NAME FROM S_MEMBER B WHERE A.SS_NO=B.SS_NO) SS_NAME, (SELECT D.NAME FROM CODE_TABLE D WHERE D.CODE=A.SS_GRADE)SS_GRADE ,A.SS_CLASS,A.SS_NUM , A.TT_NO, (SELECT TT_NAME FROM T_MEMBER C WHERE A.TT_NO=C.TT_NO) TT_NAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM ONLINE_APPLICATION E WHERE E.SS_NO = A.SS_NO AND E.TT_NO=A.TT_NO AND E.OA_STATUS='01') OA_COUNT ,(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM ONLINE_APPLICATION E WHERE E.SS_NO = A.SS_NO AND E.TT_NO=A.TT_NO) OA_COUNTALL FROM ( SELECT SS_NO SS_NO,FM_GRADE SS_GRADE,FM_CLASS SS_CLASS,FM_NUM SS_NUM,TT_NO,DELETEYN FROM FM_MEMBER WHERE DELETEYN='Y' UNION SELECT SS_NO SS_NO,JR_GRADE SS_GRADE,JR_CLASS SS_CLASS,JR_NUM SS_NUM,TT_NO,DELETEYN FROM JR_MEMBER WHERE DELETEYN='Y' UNION SELECT SS_NO SS_NO,SR_GRADE SS_GRADE,SR_CLASS SS_CLASS,SR_NUM SS_NUM,TT_NO,DELETEYN FROM SR_MEMBER WHERE DELETEYN='Y' ) A WHERE A.TT_NO=#{ttNo} ORDER BY (SELECT SUBSTR(A.SS_NO, -3) FROM DUAL) ASC
